K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-4: chos ston cing smra ba rjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-5: 'jig rten gyi dbang po smad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-6: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa rtogs pa ji ltar spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-7: ji ltar gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-8: yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang; ji ltar yongs su smin pa 'dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-9: thabs la mkhas pa grangs med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-10: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa las mi ldog par ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-11: spyod pa'i sgo sna tshogs kyi chos snang bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-12: gnas med pa'i rnam pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-13: snying rje chen po skyes pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par 'bebs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-14: sbrang bu 'gro ba ltar byams pa la 'jug cing cho 'phrul gsum yongs su 'bebs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba rnam par rig cing slas kyi dbus na 'dug pa ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276a-17: dbus med pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-0: ye shes chen po @276b la gnas pas gnon cing sgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-1: las kyi mtha'i chos gsum la thabs mkhas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-2: lus kyi las shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-3: ngag gis mi 'phro ba'i ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-4: yid kyi las zab mo chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-5: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gsum pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-6: mngon par byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba chen pos slas tshad med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-7: 'byung ba'i spyod pa ston cing 'jig rten gnas pa'i sems can 'dzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-8: 'jig rten mngon par chags par 'gyur bar byed pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-10: 'jig rten sna tshogs la mngon par chags pa zlog par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-11: 'jig rten gyi dga' ba'i sred pa gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-12: nyon mongs pa spangs pa 'jig rten spyod du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-13: don thams cad rjes su dran par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-14: 'byung ba'i don gyi phyir 'brang bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-15: khyim pa'i mtshan ma yongs su gtong bar ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-16: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la sbyor zhing gnas par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:276b-17: sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-5: bdag ye shes kyi don mthong ba'i ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-6: sems can rnams la rnam par dag pa'i sgo brjod pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-8: 'jig rten thams cad la 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-9: mngon par 'byung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan kun sgreng bar byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bzhi pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-12: ye shes du ma dang rab tu ldan pas byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin nas byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad thugs su chud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-14: bdud kyi stobs rab tu bcom zhing zil gyis mi non pa'i sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277a-15: chos kyi dbyings ma lus ba thams cad du khyab par byed pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277b-1: tshad med pa'i spyod pa rab tu brnyes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don gyi rjes su gshegs pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277b-9: zab mo'i byang chub sems dpa' la chos zab mo'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277b-11: brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas kyi phyir 'brang zhing sna tshogs kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277b-13: 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi yul du byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277b-14: sems can la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rig par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:277b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dbyer med pas 'byung ba'i sa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:278b-7: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod par 'gro ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:279a-8: gang 'di grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas sa g-yo zhing 'od zer gyi snang bas long ba rnams ni so sor mig thob /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286a-13: sna tshogs rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286a-15: bsam pa tshad med pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i mtshams kyi skad cig ma'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286a-16: chos thams cad rkyen dang 'dus pa tshogs par khong du chud pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mthong ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-0: chos kyi dbyings dbye ba mig 'phrul mkhan gyis rnam par phye ba ltar thams cad mngon @286b par mkhyen pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-2: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-7: stobs kyi bdag nyid che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-8: bzod par dga' ba'i stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-9: yongs su mnyams pa'i stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-12: 'jig rten thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-13: sems can thams cad kyi mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-14: sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal gyi chos bcu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-16: gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-17: 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis mi chod cing dug gis mi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'tshig pa'i me'i bskal pas mi 'tshig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-20: 'dzin pa'i chu'i phung po'i chus mi 'chi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-22: bdud kyi sde thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:286b-23: lha thams cad kyi stobs dang; klu thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-3: 'bar ba thams cad kyi stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-4: sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmag gi stobs kyis mi tshugs pa dang ri rab lhun po'i ri dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i char 'bebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-6: 'khor yug chen po'i ri dang mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i char babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-9: des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu'ang mi 'gul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-14: mnal ba'i spyod lam spang pa'ang mi mnga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-15: yul gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ji tsam du bzhed pa kun tu de tsam du ma bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-16: sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la'ang gtses par ma gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-17: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi sems can la'ang gtses par ma gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi 'khrugs pa lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-18: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos dang po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhed na chos thams cad kyi dbyings mchog ma lus pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287a-21: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-0: @287b ri rab lhun po'i ri dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-2: khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-4: nags stug por bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-5: sems can gnas pa'i gnas sna tshogs dang; 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu bcug ste tha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mtha' bzung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams du ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gar bcug nas tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-12: bskal par gshegs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la skad cig kyang sdug bsngal du mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-15: mthu yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-16: spyod lam la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-20: nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:287b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-0: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu 'jig rten gyi @288a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-1: khams ma lus pa thams cad kun 'dzin kyang de'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor ba'i sems skye ba gcig kyang mi mnga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-2: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos gnyis pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gom pa gcig gi spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gom pas spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-6: du ma'i sems skye zhing 'jug pa de ltar gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems bskyed pa bzhin du bskal par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gnas shing tshad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288a-8: khor yug chen po'i ri brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'gyur ba dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa 'das shing ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'gag par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-0: ji ltar ba spu'i bu ga gcig pa de @288b ltar sku'i spu'i bu ga thams cad de sems can thams cad ji snyed pa ba spu'i bu gar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-1: de ltar sems can thams cad lci bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-2: sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo gcig gi rtse mos tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-3: ji ltar sor mo gcig gis dang por 'dzin pa de ltar sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mos 'dzin kyang de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsnyel ba'ang mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-4: thugs la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-5: sdug bsngal gyi reg pa tshor ro snyam pa'i sems phra rab gcig tsam yang mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-6: de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams re rer gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-7: nam mkha' la gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-8: rgya mo'i phyogs thams cad du gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-9: de ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-11: skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi khams thams cad du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-12: skra rtsa re re'i mtha' tshad kyi grangs kyi nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi nam mkha'i khams su 'jug pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam thog ma'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:288b-13: tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par zad cing 'das kyi bar du phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-0: phyogs na skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhugs shing @289a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-2: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bzhi pa'o; ;gzhan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sku dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-5: dbu gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i ljags su gyur pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-8: chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams la go bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-11: gsung re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i mdo sde dam pa rab tu bshad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-12: mdo sde re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes su 'brang la chos bstan pa re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289a-13: 'byed pa rnams kyi brjod pa 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-0: ji ltar gang gi phyir chos ston pa de @289b ltar chos thams cad ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-1: de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams yongs su zad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-2: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-3: gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-4: gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-5: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa zad cing 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de lta ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-6: chos thams cad 'gal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'jug cing chos thams cad shes rab kyi ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-7: brda sprod cing the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-8: chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-9: chags pa med pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:289b-10: sems can mtha' yas par tshim par byed pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyan @290a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-2: ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-3: 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad la ye shes kyi sgron ma chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-4: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-5: mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig gi sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin chen po'ang dpe thams cad kyis dper bya ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-6: de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-7: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar skra'i rtse mo'i mthar nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-9: sems kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-10: ji srid du mtha' ma'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re ba de snyed de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun tu brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290a-11: de snyed de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-0: chos @290b kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-3: gsung re res de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde rnams 'chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-4: mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-7: 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzer ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-11: de ltar tha ma'i mthar bskal pa'i bar du gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-12: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos lnga pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u'i rgyun dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:290b-15: rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs pa rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud sdig can gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-0: mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul @291a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-2: byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa; skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-9: gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'ang mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-10: sems phra mo'ang mi mnga' bar gnas te mi g-yo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-11: mi bskyod mi 'gyur rnam par mi rtog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-13: bsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin tu mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-15: khong khro ba shin tu mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-16: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-17: dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-18: bag mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po thugs mi dngangs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-19: bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-20: bdud kyi sde mang po sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bzung nas zil gyis gnon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291a-21: bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-0: de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'phrul @291b gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyis khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-7: de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra de ri la thogs pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-8: ri rab lhun po la mi thogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-9: rin po che'i ri la ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-11: khor yug chen po la ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-14: gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-15: dri za'i gnas la ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-16: lha ma yin gyi gnas la ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-007:291b-17: nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin /
